tool_description:
Documentation: https://sheet2db.com/docs

Transaform Google Sheets into a powerful dynamic database. Experience the simplicity of converting Google Sheets into a robust database, complete with REST API capabilities.
name: Google Sheets API
title: Google Sheets API

api_list.name: Get Title
api_list.description: Get title of the given spreadsheet

api_list.name: Get Range
Search Records
api_list.description: Search Records using Mongo like queries.

api_list.name: Get Headers
api_list.description: Get all the header keys for the given or default sheet.

headers.description: List of all the keys in header row.

api_list.name: Count Records
api_list.description: Get a cound of total records within a Sheet(Tab).

api_list.name: Read Records
List Sheets
api_list.description: Get list of all the available sheets(tabs).
